Tooltip: Your rats live in squalor and never brush their teeth. Now their bites shut down your enemies' organs. Deal ramping damage that ignores armor.

Unleash the plague onto all nearby hordes or human controlled locations by sacrificing 30% of your population. If you spread it to a horde, they suffer from reduced armor reduction and increased resource needs for one minute. Humans suffer from gradual damage and will summon more patrols. Gain immunity to disease.
Your rats thrive in the city sewers, gaining a boost to all basal stats in the city. You can use the sewers to instantly travel between cities you control.
